name: Escape Together (itch) (Nuno "Omega Leo" Diogo)
description:
This is an entry for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The theme is: Joined Together.

The game focuses on a couple that was kidnapped by a mad scientist to be test subjects for an experiment that involves connecting the lives of 2 humans together by a link, if that link is broken by being too far apart from each other they both die.

Credits:

  • Font used: Abaddon

SFX:

  • Coin sound effect made by AudioAlchemistStore@gmail.com
  • Laser sound effect obtained from Kenney Game Assets 1

Music:

  • Night Siege(Loop) by Alec Weesner

Textures:

  • Tileset and background: Cartoon Platformer Tileset Pack by uvector
  • Some of the textures were from old Humble Bundle bundles(Coins and Background, UI Buttons)
  • Characters, Turrets, Bullets, Checkpoints made by me in Aseprite
